docs.snippet: On the basketball court, Raymond Felton and his much-maligned teammates are reminded of how much they have undermined the mandate of measuring up to mollify Carmelo Anthony....
docs.lead_paragraph: On the basketball court, Raymond Felton and his much-maligned teammates are reminded of how much they have undermined the mandate of measuring up to mollify Carmelo Anthony.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column argues that Raymond Felton is only the latest of the New York Knicks to be convicted in the court of public opinion by fans frustrated with team's dismal season; argues that season has been defined by a failure to mollify key star Carmelo Anthony.

docs.abstract: New York Knicks guard Raymond Felton reads brief prepared statement concerning felony gun charges; says he will continue to focus on helping his team qualify for the postseason, vowing that arrest will not distract team from goal.
